Java和OC语法对比.

  • March 15, 2016
  • Java枚举

class FreshJuice { enum FreshJuiceSize{ SMALL, MEDUIM, LARGE } FreshJuiceSize size; }

public class FreshJuiceTest { public static void main(String args[]){ FreshJuice juice = new FreshJuice(); juice.size = FreshJuice. FreshJuiceSize.MEDUIM ; } }
